name: Django
text:
[On Play] Choose 1 of the following effects.
• Set up to 1 of your Leader or Characters with the {East Blue} type with a cost of 6 or less as active.
• Rest this Character and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.

effect.text: Choose 1 of the following effects. • Set up to 1 of your Leader or Characters with the {East Blue} type with a cost of 6 or less as active. • Rest this Character and up to 1 of your opponent's Characters.
